steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 6-2011. A 77-year-old 
man with dyspnea, weakness, and diaphoresis.
Tsibris AM(1), Shepard JA, Zukerberg LR.

Author information:
(1)Infectious Disease Unit, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Department of 
Medicine, Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.
